name: Mortuus insula (7drl version)
description:
You have been dropped on an island by a mysterious force.

Find 3 artifacts to escape. (Cross, triangle and star)

WASD/Arrows - movement, Space - skip turn, P - drink potion, m - enable map (you are a magenta dot).

This game has been created for 7drl challenge.

I guess you can review it here

http://7drl.roguetemple.com/jsp/reviewGame.jsp?gameId=1183
